scripts.build:server: cd server/auth-service && npm install && npm run build && cd ../user-management-service && npm install && npm run build && cd ../link-up-management-service && npm install && npm run build && cd ../link-up-request-service && npm install && npm run build && cd ../notification-service && npm install && npm run build && cd ../messaging-service && npm install && npm run build && cd ../image-service && npm install && npm run build && cd ../location-service && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:auth-service -- --port=5001" "npm run start:user-management-service -- --port=5002" "npm run start:link-up-management-service -- --port=5003" "npm run start:link-up-request-service -- --port=5004" "npm run start:notification-service -- --port=5005" "npm run start:messaging-service -- --port=5006" "npm run start:location-service -- --port=5007" "npm run start:image-service -- --port=5008" "npm run start:client -- --port=5009"
